PAGE_SLIDES.title: Welcome to Maint24/7
PAGE_SLIDES.text: Maint24/7 app is a practical, modern and simple portal and tool for landlords and tenants to manage properties maintenance, contracts, and payments.

PAGE_SLIDES.title: Manage your properties
PAGE_SLIDES.text: Get updates in real time, everything that is happening on your property, a dashboard for you to manage your property.

PAGE_SLIDES.title: Maintenance
PAGE_SLIDES.text: Tenants are able to create work orders, photograph ongoing issues and get updates. All work orders are also stored the history.

PAGE_SLIDES.title: Payment
PAGE_SLIDES.text: Tenants can pay rent online or by using their mobile device. PayPal alows payments to be make instantly or gives the option of reoccuring payments to made.
